Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Conrad Pieczynski
Reviews.Content: The canon Powershot ELPH 330 HS is a fine camera for the money.  A general use camera good for people who travel light but want to take decent pictures.  Reading the manual is a must.

Reviews.Title: Camera bundle
Reviews.Author: Kris Ley
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is wonderful however the add on bundle was cheap and inexpensive and my advice is to never purchase a bundle from this seller.Originally this was priced at $159 however as Christmas approached it went to $189.........This was about $80 for cheap garbage add ons.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 MP DIGIC 5 CMOS Sensor
10x Optical Zoom 24mm Wide-Angle lens
Smart AUTO, Intelligent IS, and 1080p Full HD video recording
High Speed AF and High-Speed Burst up to 6.2 frames
New ECO Mode to reduce power consumption
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 330 HS 12.1 MP Wi-Fi Enabled CMOS Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom 24mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full HD Video (Black) + 16GB Memory Card + Kit
